title: The Face in the Archive
description: A Deep Archive librarian realises that a portrait in the gallery's Pre-Scourge collection perfectly matches a woman seen regularly in the Market Ward — despite the portrait being painted over a hundred years ago. She wants someone to investigate without causing panic.

turns.narrative: The portrait shows a Concordat official named Senna in formal ceremonial robes. The resemblance to a Market Ward fixture — a quiet, observant woman who tends a tea stall — is genuinely extraordinary. Same bone structure, same unusual light grey eyes.
turns.choice_a: Go directly to the Market Ward tea stall and speak with the woman
turns.consequence_a: The woman is startled but not frightened when you describe the portrait. She says her name is Senna, and she has been waiting for someone to find it.
turns.choice_b: Research the portrait's background through the Archive's records first
turns.consequence_b: Records show Senna was a senior Concordat Archivist who specialised in Cognitive Preservation — a now-lost branch of Concordat science.

turns.narrative: Senna — whether descended from or somehow the same person as the portrait subject — has a perfectly clear and detailed memory of the Pre-Scourge Concordat and the events leading to the Scourge. She is entirely cooperative but matter-of-fact about her nature.
turns.choice_a: Bring Elder Survivor Ora to meet Senna to verify her Pre-Scourge memories
turns.consequence_a: Ora is astounded. She confirms details from Senna that only someone who was actually there could know.
turns.choice_b: Ask Senna to document her memories in writing for the Archive
turns.consequence_b: Senna spends three days writing. The Archive receives its most complete Pre-Scourge first-hand account.

turns.narrative: Senna says the Concordat used Cognitive Preservation technology to ensure that institutional memory survived the Scourge — and she is one of only three such preserved individuals.
turns.choice_a: Recommend Senna be introduced to the Ward Council as a Living Archive resource
turns.consequence_a: The Council is deeply interested. Senna agrees to serve as a formal historical adviser.
turns.choice_b: Keep Senna's existence quiet and let her continue as she was
turns.consequence_b: Senna thanks you genuinely. She continues her quiet life, now with someone who knows her secret.

senna_introduced.description: Senna introduced to the Ward Council as a Living Archive resource.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Senna introduced to the Ward Council as a Living Archive resource.
